name: Volleybot Revenge
description:
It's 2077 (cough, cough), you'r a volleyball robot trainer. One day, in the middle of an important match, a group of aliens decide to invade the earth. Now you'r angry and dangerous and decide to teach them a lesson.

In this game, the player controls a robot with a volleyball move set: he can serve, set, dig and spike the ball. He also has a cool dash. During the first two levels, the player will face melee and distance enemies until reaching the last one, the Final Boss.

During all this serious staff, you can enjoy some intense synth wave music and neon graphics.
